title: InnkeeperPro
description: InnkeeperPro is a FullStack hotel management system used to view listed hotels, rooms and make booking with an admin dashboard.
longDescription: InnkeeperPro is a complete hotel management solution built with scalability in mind. It allows guests to browse hotels, book rooms, and make secure payments while providing administrators with a dashboard to manage listings, bookings, and customers efficiently.

title: Recapify
description: A text transformation tool that allows users to summarize, paraphrase, and generate text using Gemini API and a TTS audio file that is downloadable.
longDescription: Recapify leverages AI with the Gemini API to provide powerful text transformation features such as summarization, paraphrasing, and content generation. It also integrates TTS with downloadable audio files, all within a clean, React and TailwindCSS-powered interface.

title: StoryNest
description: StoryNest is a modern social blogging platform that enables users to share stories, experiences, and engage with a community of writers and readers.
longDescription: StoryNest empowers writers and readers to connect through a blogging platform designed for engagement. Users can post stories, interact with comments, and share experiences, while the backend manages data securely with MongoDB and Cloudinary for media hosting.

title: Trivio
description: A fullstack quiz application that allows users to create quizzes, answer questions from various categories.
longDescription: Trivio is an interactive quiz platform that enables users to create, play, and compete in quizzes across multiple categories and difficulty levels. It features a leaderboard system, score tracking, and quiz filtering options.

title: ChatSpace
description: A real-time full-stack chat application using React, Express, and MongoDB, featuring serverless functions hosted on Google Cloud.
longDescription: ChatSpace is a messaging app built for speed and scalability. It supports real-time communication with Socket.io, integrates with Google Cloud Functions for serverless operations, and provides a smooth, responsive UI with React.
